entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:36 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:36 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
